title: What can I do if my navigation application is slow in positioning or experience positioning failure?
answer:
l   Some navigation applications may need a network connection. Connect to a Wi-Fi network or turn on the data service and try again.

l   GPS satellite signals are weak indoors, which may cause slow positioning or positioning failure. Take your phone to an open area with good reception.

Contact the technical support of the application, or try another navigation application.

If the problem persists, contact Huawei technical support or take your phone to an authorized Huawei service center.
